body:
`jsoncpp %clang@10.0.0:` will fail building on implicit int-float conversion errors.  Fixed upstream in https://github.com/open-source-parsers/jsoncpp/pull/1023, released in 1.9.2 (also added here).

I suspect one day other compilers may potentially error on that too, but was conservative with the `@when` clause since this is all I've tested.
title: jsoncpp add 1.9.2, patch %clang@10 for implicit conversion
